content.question: The most probable cause for the difference in mean stem length between plants in dish A and plants in dish B is which of the following?

choices.label: Shortening of cells in the stem in response to the lack of light
Elongation of seedlings in response to the lack of light
Enhancement of stem elongation by light

content.answer: Elongation of seedlings in response to the lack of light

skill.text: 6.D: Explain the relationship between experimental results and larger biological concepts, processes, or theories.
